name: Catnip Delivery
description:
By Team Cat Ppl =^._.^= ∫

Mr. Stache N E E D S to put his paws on that brand new magic kit.

For that to happen, he’s gonna have to get his fur dirty.

His master have some important clients around town buying his special herbs
and needs someone to deliver the goods.

This game was created by 3 artists and 1 programmer in 48h for the 19th Edition of the Creative Jam by Polygames!

The theme was : " A World of Illusion ".
The technical challenge was : " Increasing difficulty ".

All assets are original except the fishes and the music! Only one plugin was used for the gravity mecanic.

- Made in UE4 -

Credits :

Alex Fillion - 3D Modelling, Textures, Level Art, Animation, Rigging, Level Design
Maëlig Beaupérin - Illustrations, UI Integration, 2D graphics, 3D Modelling, Textures
Etienne Lemay - 3D Modelling, FX, Music finder
Léonard Oest O'Leary - Programming, Wizard
